tool_description: Validates document structure against templates and business standards, checking for required sections, proper organization, and completeness.

document_type.description: Type of document for validation rules

strict_mode.description: Whether to enforce strict template compliance

error_messages: Empty document content: Provide document content for structure validation
Invalid document type: Provide a recognized document type for validation
Missing template sections: Provide required sections for validation
Document too large: Maximum document size exceeded for validation
usage: Provide document_content, template_sections, and document_type for structure validation. Set strict_mode for enforcement level.

validation_status.description: Overall validation result: passed, failed, or partial

missing_sections.description: List of required sections not found in document
